title: count(c_code) price > 1000
sql: select count(c_code) from gold where price > 1000

title: sum(price) where price<1000
sql: select sum(price) from gold where price < 1000

title: 多条件查询
sql: select  count(price) from  gold where(c_code=5152) and (price <= 3948 and price >= 3946) and (day > 20181031 or (day=20181031  and time>=95327897)) and (day < 20181031 or (day=20181031  and time<=95838463));
